Earthquake Feed Colored circle representing magnitude.
Recent Saved
Magnitude Felt By Lat, Long Depth Intensity Time Map
wat.seth.dev.capstone.notif Notification Settings
notif_toggle Notifications Select to enable notifications.
notif_location Location Select a location to receive notifications for earthquakes.
wat.seth.dev.capstone.notif_range Range How many miles around selected location to search within.
notif_min_mag Magnitude Only send alerts for earthquakes equal or greater than this magnitude.
notif_interval Interval Time in minutes to wait between check of earth quake occurrences.
search Search Settings
search_min_mag Minimum magnitude Only show results above this magnitude.
search_max_mag Maximum magnitude Show no results with a magnitude greater than this value.
search_start_date Start date Only show earthquakes occurring on or after this date.
search_end_date End date Only show earthquakes occurring on or before this date
search_location Location Maps will default the starting position to this location.
search_range Range Only show results within this range from the selected location. 0 is global.
search_order_by Order by Order results by date or magnitude
search_descending Sort descending Changes the default sorting of results from ascending to descending.
NotifRangeange List--> Exact Location 50 miles 100 miles 150 miles 200 miles 250 miles 500 miles 1000 miles
